quotes.quote: Agony sometimes changes form but it never ceases for anybody.
Man's unique agony as a species consists in his perpetual conflict between the desire to stand out and the need to blend in.
The agony of lovers burns with the fire of passion. Lovers leave traces of where they've been. The wailing of broken hearts is the doorway to God.

Controlled hysteria is what's required. To exist constantly in a state of controlled hysteria. It's agony. But everyone has agony. The difference is that I try to take my agony home and teach it to sing.
When we focus on our pain, our ache deepens.
The pain we suffer is a way to make us appreciate what comes next.
Love was an agony beyond compare.
Longing is the agony of the nearness of the distant.
Get through the agony and anger, the pain and strife, and take the necessary steps to try to change my life.
To describe the agony of a marathon to someone who's never run it is like trying to explain color to someone who was born blind.
We suffer much agony because we try to get from people what only God can give us, which is a sense of worth and value. Look to God for what you need, not to people.
We're all afraid of suffering or agony or torture. It's only natural in some ways. It's only human, let's say. I don't know how natural it is. It probably is conditioning.

What was the difference between love and the agony of waiting? Like love, the agony of waiting began in the muscles somewhere around the upper belly but soon spread out to the chest, the thighs, and the forehead, to invade the entire body with numbing force.
Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional.
Pain withheld becomes hate, pain shared becomes love.
Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
The pain of yesterday is the strength of today.
The pain that we cause is the cause of our pain.
The pain of the flesh is naught to that of the heart.
Even while you're in pain, your happiness will be waiting.
Pain is the fuel that lights the flame of our enlightenment.
Recycle your pain, allow your pain to reach you to greatness.
If you do not transform your pain, you will always transmit it.
What is the worst pain? To me, it's always the pain that is present.
The pain of love is the pain of being alive. It is a perpetual wound.
Pain is the great teacher of mankind. Beneath its breath souls develop.

To experience the agony of defeat makes you stronger. It's like taking one step back and two steps forward. To experience the agony of defeat makes you appreciate the experience of winning. That's what makes a champion.
Pain is weakness leaving the body.
Pain is a horribly wonderful gift.
Pain is pain. It needs no description.
Without pain, we couldn't know joy.
Depression is pain in its purest form.
God never allows pain without a purpose.
It's true that the pain makes people change
Only pain can define the meaning of tears.
Every addiction starts with pain and ends with pain.
Pain Doesn't go away, you just make room for it.
Our pain carves out a larger space for love to fill.
Your pain is an opportunity for you to learn about yourself.
Pain is a message, and you can choose to ignore that message.
The pain is when the dreams change, as they do, as they must.
Compassion is to share the pain without sharing the suffering.
People do not hear our pain when they believe they are at fault.
People in pain don't always see things as clearly as they should.
There is great pain in all love, but we don't care, it's worth it.
